scbm_settings_t Struct Reference

This structure defines the SCBM port settings.

Data Fields

  • unsigned long bitrate
  • unsigned long coreclock
  • unsigned long busdelay
  • unsigned long ui32BlockIndex

Field Documentation

unsigned long scbm_settings_t::bitrate

Data transfer bit rate (in kHz).

unsigned long scbm_settings_t::coreclock

Core clock (in kHz).

unsigned long scbm_settings_t::busdelay

Bus delay (in 10th of ns).

unsigned long scbm_settings_t::ui32BlockIndex

Block index
